description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Copenhagen 2016
http://gotocph.com
Stephen Foreshew-Cain - Successfully creating and growing high performing and complex organisations

ABSTRACT
With government’s reputation for bureaucracy and risk aversion, and with the price of failure high and often public, what is about this modern government digital team that has enabled them to be so successful and make such a significant impact on public services in the UK. [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
https://gotocon.com/cph-2016/presentations/show_talk.jsp?oid=7755
